1.content: Are you Saria or Miles?
1.title: Who are you

11.content:
Miles Helsing was going out trick or treating in a Simon Belmont costume. This was the first time he had gone out alone so his father gave him a Chain whip to defend himself.

Along the way he met another kid and the two decided it would be better if they traveled together. the was dressed in a ________ costume.
11.title: Going out Trick or Treating (Miles)

111.content: Was the kid a boy or a girl
111.title: Gender (Werewolf )

info.brief_description: you're a kid who  goes home with a real halloween monster on Halloween night.
info.description:
Okay you are either Miles or Saria Helsing and you are Invited to go home with a kid you go trick or treating with where you find out s/he was a real creature of the night


Main Character
Miles Helsing
Species: Human
Age 13
Description: Miles Helsing Is a 13 year old boy who is 5'6. he has light brown hair blue eyes and is in a Simon Belmont.
Equipment: Chain whip
Fears:Spiders and Small Spaces

Saria Helsing
Species Human
Age 13
Description: Saria Helsing is a 13 year old girl who is 5'4. She has golden blonde hair that goes down to her shoulders and always wears a blue headband. Her eyes are blue and She is in a knight costume.
Equipment: Blade of Dawn
Fears: Darkness and Hights

The Monsters

Lupin Sliverbane
Species: Werewolf
Age 14
Description: A young werewolf with black fur, and red eyes, He is 5'7 and elder of the Silverbane siblings. He is a jokester who loves tormenting humans. He is very protective of his little sister and cares for her above prnking mortals.

Luna Silverbane
Species Werewolf
Age 12
Description: a Werewolf cub who has gold fur and yellow eyes. She is a very shy girl without meny friends who unlike her brother she likes humans but is too timid to speak to theam and is afraid of almost everything.

Alucard Blood
Species: Vampire
Age:13
Description: Alucard has short spikey white hair and red eyes. Alucard dosn't really care for humans he sometimes finds it amusing to scare them sometimes but he doesn't make a habit of it. His only pet peave is that he is naed after a Castlevania character and doesn't like people mentioning it.

Sarina Blood
Species: Vampire
Age:15
Description: Sarina has red eyes and long black hair that goes down to her waist. She is Alucard's older sister who babies him. She loves scaring humans more then anything and has the nickname Ally for her little brother.

I'll add more species as time goes on but this should work for a start and I know I'm lousy with puns

Miles and Saria are decendents of Van Helsing but dont know it yet. Prior to the night their father gave them each a real weapon to defend themselves with becausehe knew mosters existed so the weapon that they carry with them have monster slaying magic
info.pretty_title: Going home with a Halloween Monster
